title: [FEATURE] Vulkan support on macOS
body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem?

I'm building a cross-platform app using SkiaSharp with a vulkan backend and I noticed that the native library doesn't seem to include the necessary vulkan support on the macOS platform (trying to create objects like `GRVkExtensions` returns a null handle)

### Describe the solution you would like

Build the native skia library with vulkan support

### Describe alternatives you have considered

none?

### Additional context

_No response_

### Code of Conduct

- [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
